headline: Should Zimmer Biomet's AI-Powered Orthopedic Robotics Launch Prompt Action From ZBH Investors?
summary: Earlier this week, Zimmer Biomet Holdings showcased its latest orthopedic robotics and digital health innovations, including FDA-cleared mBos TKA System and the recently acquired Monogram Technologies robotic platform, at the annual meeting of the American Association of Hip and Knee Surgeons. A standout revelation was the integration of AI-driven and autonomous technologies into the company's expanding knee and hip portfolios, reflecting Zimmer Biomet’s commitment to advancing surgical...
